subtitle: thank you is one of the most powerful
words in the English language because it
reminds us that we are dependent on
others and that everything we do is
connected these affirmations all start
with those two powerful words you can
direct this thank you toward anything
you want what matters is that it
connects with you so do what feels right
for you now you can do these
affirmations in any way you want you can
say them out loud or in your mind you
can listen to them while you make coffee
or walk your dog for the deepest
experience find a comfortable position
and settle into a nice meditative state
but no matter how you choose to do them
let's start by taking a deep breath
together let's start these very strong
thank you mantras now thank you God for
this wonderful day I'm about to have
thank you for all the amazing magical
times in my life I'm thankful for
everything you've done for me and
everything I can feel coming my way I'm
sure today will be full of Happiness
laughter fun and
ease I'm thankful for all the ways you
hold me today your greatness I'm lucky
to have a life I can use
thank you thank you thank you God for
being slow and kind to me today I think
I'll be present and kind thank God for
all of my great luck I will be
productive happy and satisfied all day
thank you God for all the times I feel
loved and light I know that your love is
something I deserve
I can see and feel that my day is going
to go perfectly I give myself over to
the unknown possibilities that are best
for me thank you God for always being
with me in love and for the grace you
pour over everything today I am so
grateful for all the times I can feel
you with me you're with me and I can
feel and hear your wisdom God thank you
for making everyone I talk to today
believe that things will get better I am
happy and grateful for all the many
gifts and amazing healing music you use
to help everyone I know thank you for
all the love knowledge and healing you
give my family and
friends God thank you for for giving me
words thoughts and feelings that move me
that is exactly what I need at this very
time today I let go of everything that
doesn't serve me anymore and by God's
grace I
growing God I am so grateful for every
moment of poise and confidence through
change and
challenge thank you God for peace in my
mind and calm in my heart I can feel my
heart and mind aligning with your
expanded ever ever
energy thank you God for all the massive
abundance that floods into my life today
and everyday moving forward I can feel
it all around me now supporting all my
needs and so much more thank you for
encouraging my focused presence and
positive outlook
I expect good things to happen today and
they do because my thoughts are with you
I am so grateful that you have released
the genius within me today I can feel
how in alignment I am with your infinite
intelligence thanks for my life thanks
for giving me a mind and a body thank
you for the food that nourishes me thank
you for the home that protects me
thank you for the people that surround
me thank you for the activities that
interest me thank you for the abundance
of blessings in my life thank you for
the gift of another beautiful day thank
you for the love that fills my heart all
the time to thank you for my heal thank
you for the supportive relationships
that uplift and inspire me thank you for
the opportunities that allow me to grow
and
learn thank you for the challenges that
helped me become stronger and wiser than
you and for the beauty that surrounds me
thank you for the lessons that guided me
thank you for the joy that fills my
heart thank you for my friends thank you
for the mentors who have helped me thank
you for the strength to overcome tough
time thank you for the enjoyment of the
good times thank you for the freedom to
choose and create my own path thank you
for the deep and meaningful Connections
in my life thank you for the inspiration
that fuels me thank you for the ability
to forgive let go and move thank you for
the kindness of
strangers thank you for the support of
those who Stand By Me thank you for my
mistakes for they have made me
wiser I am grateful for many things in
my life that bring me joy and comfort I
express deep appreciation for the small
steps achieve each day everything that
is happening now is happening for my
ultimate good I choose to be kind to
myself and love myself
unconditionally I am thankful that with
each experience I become a better
version of myself I am grateful for
everything the good and the bad because
it made me I start each day with an
attitude of gratitude and sustain that
attitude all day long I am grateful for
my
freedom i a attract
abundance I don't take those who love
and support me for
granted I am grateful for my financial
position I am thankful for my health and
well-being I am grateful for
today I appreciate that I have the means
and knowledge to nourish my
body thank you for the chance to make a
positive impact on this world thank you
for this moment of
Peace thank you for helping me realize
how special I am thank you for the gift
of this life God I am so grateful that
you made my body strong and healthy you
can see me appreciating this beautiful
vessel today by giving it good food and
lots of water thank you for letting me
walk move hug and hold thank you for
letting me love laugh and cry I use my
body in the best way possible today
making the most of its strength and
flexibility thank you God for all the
amazing coincidences that have happened
today the timing and arrival of your
goods are
perfect thank you so much for giving me
the chance to to be a channel for your
love energy a source of the beauty
you've made the
world God thank you for the mysterious
and amazing parts of our journey thank
you for the magical times when two
people can connect between groups
between you and me God thank you for
giving me a heart mind body and spirit
you helped me understand that I am never
alone
thank you God for the colors my eyes see
for the smells my nose registers and for
my body today thank you for your soft
lips and gentle
kisses thank you God for a warm
supportive hand on my back and an
unexpected hug just when I needed it
thank you God for good communication
today for sharing thoughts and feelings
and for creating new things together
thank you God for life and this
outstanding beautiful day you're always
with me making this amazing experience
together every day thank you God that's
all of our mantras for now let's end the
way we started by taking a big breath
together so fill your lungs with all of
that thank you for the music that just
played hold and relax and if you have
your eyes closed you can open them
whenever you're ready well friend I hope
you liked these affirmations that you're
feeling happy full of thanks I want you
to say thank you everywhere you go today
because that's great to hear and it's a
really easy gift to give someone thank
you again thanks for being here to wake
me up and for being my friend through
this thing called life even if it's just
on the internet if you liked it it means
just as much to me hope to see you again
soon on wake me up until then go out and
say thank you more than once anything
you thought was possible and if you do
I'm sure you'll have a great time today
